data.message: What a wonderful opportunity for different places in the world. I think it's important for everybody to be connected one day

replies.message: We agree, Steve! Learn more about Aquila here: http://bit.ly/29QLk4f. -Brad
Facebook Great and Outstanding. Thanks so much
Facebook da li moze prevod na bosanskom voljela bi procitati
That is amazing.   What happens in bad storms?

..wife Sherry Holzwarth speaking; I love this. My husband Jack just showed me this article. Affordable. For us would be a key. We get "some" service. No mobile phones services.  Even though it shows on ALL THE MAPS ETC the we get mobile service's.  Not true. We have to pay outrageous prices for wireless Internet access. I agree for MANY anything would be a major improvement. I'm so shocked with all our products and knowledge that something hasn't been done along time ago. So Thank you Facebook.
Congrats fab for connecting the world even more!
Hello Steven Britt you haveinternet access?
Facebook How to lessen the potential for abuse?

Facebook I have a few questions. 
1.When Aquila is in flight at various regions... Is it then that remote areas will have connectivity? 
2. Or, if it is 24/7, will a satellite be launched and beaming their area? 
3. Will or does Aquila have cameras to report back?
4. Can it be detected on radar as to keep all the other aircrafts safe? 
Thank God for such technology and the wisdom he gives people. Always great to see and chat family and friends across the globe through Facebook and other social media.
Meanwhile homeless people are on Facebook's doorstep.
Jesus said You will always have the poor
Thank you , cuz I have no internet other than my phone cuz no internet company can go to rural areas...!!!
I wonder if this internet also working overseas like Asian country.🤔
